name: Foundry VTT
description: Run Foundry Virtual Tabletop on Heroku and save data to GitHub

ADMIN_KEY.description: A password for accessing the admin settings of Foundry

FOUNDRY_LICENSE.description: Your Foundry license code. Find on https://foundryvtt.com/ under your username > Purchased Licenses

FOUNDRY_VERSION.description: The Foundry version to use. Find latest at https://foundryvtt.com/releases/

GITHUB_REPO.description: GitHub repository name to store Foundry data in. E.g. username/foundry-data

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: GitHub personal access token. Generate with 'repo' scope at https://github.com/settings/tokens/new
